Methods in org.mokai.persist.jdbc with parameters of type MessageCriteria
 Collection<Message> JdbcMessageStore.list(MessageCriteria criteria)
           
 Collection<Message> OutboundInboundHandler.listMessages(Connection conn, MessageCriteria criteria)
          If the direction is null, it retrieves the messages from both handlers, otherwise, if the direction is Direction#OUTBOUND, it retrieves the messages only from the outbound handler, and if it is Direction#INBOUND, retrieves only the messages from the inbound handler.
 Collection<Message> MessageHandler.listMessages(Connection conn, MessageCriteria criteria)
          Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.
 void OutboundInboundHandler.updateMessagesStatus(Connection conn, MessageCriteria criteria, byte newStatus)
          If the direction is null, it updates the status in both handlers, otherwise, if the direction is Direction#OUTBOUND, it uses only the outbound handler, if it is Direction#INBOUND, it uses only the inbound handler.
 void MessageHandler.updateMessagesStatus(Connection conn, MessageCriteria criteria, byte newStatus)
          Updates the status of all the messages that matches the criteria.
